data.text: @hhhdrew25 @_mbdr_ All I wanted from my previous tweet was receiving a smart advice from someone like you 😳I now have it and all my problems, including the #Pandemie and #LongCovid issues, have disappeared! You should be proud of yourself for snapping at people here!
@javadi_s @_mbdr_ Stay in your house and get the fck over it then😂 this isn’t gonna end, you’re just being a wuss. People are going to live their lives even if you’re scared
@_mbdr_ @FLAHAULT The answer is simple: it doesn’t.

@_mbdr_ With testing at a low level in Switzerland as well, the true number of cases is likely much higher. If we’re not already at a higher level than the previous peak, we soon will be. And there will be nothing to stop it climbing well beyond after that.

@AlexSansaEthos @_mbdr_ THESE EVIDENCE IS NOT AVAILABLE ELSEWHERE IN THE WORLD! https://t.co/Zfwsmz5dRC.NAVI.RUS IS CREATED BY R.OTHS.CHILD and KILLED 5 MILLION PEOPLE WITH COVID19. HOW MANY PEOPLE WILL DIE WITH THE V.A.CCINE SPIKE IN IT? WATCH THE EVIDENCE CAREFULLY.

@CameliaDewan @_mbdr_ @hosjon00 Yes. We are going to slowly know how much damage this virus is going to inflict on societies at large. 
I'm depressed to think of all the poor individuals who will have to suffer needlessly until we learn that this virus is not one to "live with".

@_mbdr_ By the way, as you feel safe with the excellent vaccine*, it is appreciated you get the shot, as your personal choice & the next boosters too.

*better say emergency use treatment, hope you agree, with 4 shots within 12-15 months, it's not scientific to call it #vaccine right?

@NielsANielsen @_mbdr_ @hosjon00 I’m wondering about how many youngish people (below 60) are suddenly dying of strokes and cardiac arrests? Is it increasing pre-2020? It’s just anecdotal on my end but until now I hadn’t  heard about friends of friends dying so suddenly like that.
